paragraph.paragraph:
Located in the object tool toolbar, this command
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_expand_string_color.gif opens an Expanded display dialog when an object is dropped onto the button.
The dropped object needs to have a string representation of its value, for instance an object conform to /libraries/base/reference/kernel/string_chart.xmlSTRING or conform to /libraries/base/reference/support/debug_output_chart.xmlDEBUG_OUTPUT (see
17_debug_output.xml Debug Output )
This dialog show the object as a string, by default the displayed length is 50:

If the limits are over the current slice limits, the displayed string will end by "..." to show there is more.
If you click on the auto expand button
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_auto_slice_limits_color.png , the slice limits will be set to the lower and upper limits of the string value.

You can enable or disable the line wrapping by clicking onto
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_word_wrap_color.png .
